room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: Phenomenal! We only had a group of 4 so we were paired with 4 others. Love the idea of having to work through something with people you haven't met. We had a great group that worked great together. Great story lines... The pressure was on!

room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: We had the best time, We didn't get out but we had fun, I highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: Loved the Baker Street Challenge with 6 of my cooleague last Sunday. 60 min looked a lot, but really wasn't for a big group like ours. We had a great time and will go again sometime in future.

room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: So much fun!! Definitely recommend! Worth every penny!

room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: Super fun! We had a blast going through the room. We will be talking about this adventure for a long time!

room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: Four of us went tonight & did the Baker Street room. More fun than I could have ever imagined. Highly recommend this!!

room_title: Escape room "221B Baker Street" by Cincinnati Escape Room in Cincinnati
review: Loved it. 221B was well worth the money. It was challenging, but not impossible. I would absolutely recommend to friends.
